name: Narwhal Polo VR
description:
Description

You and team Aqua have finally made it to the Narwhal Polo League. They said you couldn't make it, but you did and it's time to show team Orange what you're made of.

Mount your narwhal and lead the team to victory.

Warning: This game does involve motion, so be aware if you are prone to motion sickness. Directions

Moving

Use your left controller to point where you want you narwhal to go. The location will be marked by an arrow. Squeeze the trigger to move towards the arrow.

Playing

At the start of each play session, the narwhals need to move to their starting locations. Direct your narwhal into the orange circle to start play. Use the mallet in your right hand to knock the ball in the orange goal.
